exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type f : A -> nat eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b} a, b : nat ln1, ln2 : list nat t1, t2 : btree A l1, l2 : list (btree A) n : nat t : btree A H0 : forall n1 : nat, In n1 ln1 -> n1 < a H1 : forall n1 : nat, In n1 (b :: ln2) -> n1 <= a H2 : length ln1 = length l1 Unable to unify "height_pred ?M1553 [?M1553] [?M1554] ?M1554" with "height_pred n (ln1 ++ Init.Nat.pred a :: ln2) (l1 ++ node t1 t2 :: l2) t".

original: intros. induction H. - intros. apply height_pred_nil. - intros. apply height_pred_node. + apply IHheight_pred1. + apply IHheight_pred2. + auto. + auto. + auto. + auto. + auto.
